thread.title: Two years on, Brussels attack survivor feels abandoned

title: Two years on, Brussels attack survivor feels abandoned
text:
2 years on, Brussels attack victims feel abandoned 8:59am EDT - 01:30 
The second anniversary of a militant attack in Belgium in which 32 people died brings back painful memories for Walter Benjamin, whose right leg was partially amputated because he was caught in a bomb blast at the airport.   
The second anniversary of a militant attack in Belgium in which 32 people died brings back painful memories for Walter Benjamin, whose right leg was partially amputated because he was caught in a bomb blast at the airport.  //reut.rs/2IHkBos
